description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE, ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION, THE INSERTION OF 2 X ROOFLIGHTS INTO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND THE INSERTION OF A WINDOW TO FRONT ELEVATION AT FIRST FLOOR LEVEL.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations (hip to gable & rear roof extension) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations (insertion of 2 x rooflights to the front roof slope) would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations (insertion of window to front elevation at first floor level) would consist of the alteration of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
